name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its shiny yellow box and retro console buttons, Retrotron stands tall with its soldier-like arms and legs. Its screen emits a powerful laser, making it a formidable presence. With its sleek design and functionality, Retrotron is a prized possession of the WebtrES club.
